price: 37. Kaadu kaxxa dambittee kee qaxuma umaaneenak yaxxeereeniih, umam keenil baaha тага yinqibe ken tekkek qafu keenih aba mara.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَجۡتَنِبُونَ كَبَٰٓئِرَ ٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَٱلۡفَوَٰحِشَ وَإِذَا مَا غَضِبُواْ هُمۡ يَغۡفِرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
